: : Diesel : :

Now that everyone was on the ship, Diesel hits the thrusters. There is a shake as the ship lifts off. Diesel avoids the anti-air weapons, and the ship heads away from Cybertron, for the Transwarp rift.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Hollywood Narrator 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 1:43 AM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


  Deemos transforms and runs up. He climbs into the ship. Arrow is smiling a gap toothed grin. He suddenly spins around and starts firing rapidly at every vehicle parked in the lot with a gattling gun. He spins around, causing several ruined vehicles and 2 explosions. A fuel leaks from about 98 percent of the vehicles fired upon. Arrow pulls a flamethrower from nowhere and fires, setting the entire place ablaze. Arrow, smiling evilly, finally walked up and climbed into the ship...

    ----- Original Message -----
    From: RoboRick007
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
    Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 2:30 PM
    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


    : : Diesel : :

    After his blade cuts through several more Maximals, Diesel makes his way onto the ship. Lucky for then it had no Maximals on board.

    Diesel poked his head back out.

    Diesel: Arrow, Deemos, you guys coming?!
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: LurkerAbyss 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 11:55 AM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                                                                                                          : : Sting : :

                                             Sting whips out a black energon baseball-bat like weapon.  He smacks a Maximal across the head, actually knocking the head off.

                                                                                               Sting:  Let's get the hell out of here!

                                                  He makes sure no Maximals can see him, and then he sneaks his way onto the ship, and waits for the others.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: RoboRick007 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2002 12:19 AM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


        : : Diesel : :

        He points a ship out in the distance.

        Diesel: I suggest that one. It's a military ship. Shields, weapons, everything we'll need. The others all seem to be science ships.

        Diesel pulled is sword from subspace. It began to glow a crimson red and energy was emitted from it. Diesel was revealed as one of the few "laser rod" fighters.

        Diesel: Let's go!

        He runs at the shuttle he had pointed out.

        Diesel does not get far before about twenty Maximals appear, all with plasma weapons. Diesel dives behind a science ship as plasma charges strike his former position.

        The Maximals wait for smoke to clear, unsure if they had taken down their target. They hadn't. Diesel leaps at them his blade glowing, and slashes. Two Maximals bodies fall limp, their decapitated heads rolling at Diesel's feet.

        Diesel: You guys wanna get involved here or what?

        He is brought back to battle as two more shots bounce off his blade.

        Diesel: The hell with this!

        From Diesel's shoulders come two rockets, which hit a hanger, causeing it to collaps on a group of Maximals standing outfront it...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: LurkerAbyss 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 11:05 PM
          Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                                                                                                             : : Sting : :

                                                                                  Sting drives in and comes to a halt next to Diesel.  He transforms to robot mode.

                                                                                                Sting:  They're all quite nice.  What do you guys think?
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: RoboRick007 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 10:32 PM
            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


            : : Diesel : :

            Diesel pulled up alongside Arrow and transformed to his robot mode.

            Diesel: Ok, pick a ship, and lets get to the killing!
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: Hollywood Narrator 
              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 9:17 PM
              Subject: Re: Secret Messages


              Deemos follows Diesel. Arrow speeds up to a parking lot. He transforms to robot mode.

              Arrow: This is my grand opportunity. I made an explosive exit last time...

                ----- Original Message -----
                From: LurkerAbyss
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 8:17 PM
                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                                                                                                                  : : Sting : :

                                                                                                                Sting:  Alright, let's head out.

                                                                     He transforms into a scorpion vehicle.  Basically, a scorpion on wheels.  He follows Diesel and company.
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: RoboRick007 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 2:10 PM
                  Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                  : : Diesel : :

                  Diesel: Great, glad to have you with us.

                  He transformes back to truck mode.

                  Diesel: Lets continue on our way!

                  He continues to drive on.
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: LurkerAbyss 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                    Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:47 PM
                    Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                                                                                                                     : : Sting : :

                                                                                                            Sting smiles, and nods, acknowledging the offer.

                                                                                                            Sting:  It would be a pleasure to aid you all.
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: RoboRick007 
                      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                      Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:43 AM
                      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                      : : Diesel : :

                      Diesel takes Sting's hand and shakes it. Diesel had excepted Sting, he was not a enemie.

                      Diesel: I have a proposition for you, Sting. We are on our way to Earth, of the past, through the Transwarp rift. We plan to build a great army. Would you like to join us?

                      Diesel waited for a reply.
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: LurkerAbyss 
                        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                        Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 12:06 AM
                        Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                                                                                                                        : : Sting : :

                                                                                                                    Sting nods and then smiles a bit.
                            
                                                                                                               Sting:  It's a pleasure to meet you all.

                                                                                                 He extends his arm and hand out to Diesel, for a handshake.
                          ----- Original Message ----- 
                          From: RoboRick007 
                          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                          Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:58 PM
                          Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                          : : Diesel : :

                          Diesel transforms to his robot mode.

                          Diesel: I am Diesel.

                          He motions to the others.

                          Diesel: This is Arrow and Deemos.
                            ----- Original Message ----- 
                            From: LurkerAbyss 
                            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                            Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:55 PM
                            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                                                                                                                     : : Sting : :

                                                                                                               He walks closer, and gets ready to speak.

                                                                                                                 Sting:  Hi.  It's Sting.  Who are you?
                              ----- Original Message ----- 
                              From: RoboRick007 
                              To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                              Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:53 PM
                              Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                              : : Diesel : :

                              The dark tanker sees as this mysterious bot, Sting, drops down infront of their convoy. He activates his breaks screeching to a stop.

                              Diesel: Who are you, and what do you want?
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: LurkerAbyss 
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:42 PM
                                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                                                           : : Sting : :

                                                    A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be decending from the sky, up ahead, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and Deemos.  He waits to see if they will see him and stop...
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: RoboRick007 
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:31 PM
                                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                : : Diesel : :

                                Diesel pulls out, following the others towards their destination.
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: Hollywood Narrator 
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 9:47 PM
                                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                Arrow transforms into a motorcycle. He whips around on a dime and speeds towards the destination. Deems transforms into a mechanical vulture and flies along behind...

                                ----- Original Message -----
                                From: RoboRick007
                                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
                                Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 2:29 PM
                                Subject: Re: Secret Messages


                                : : Diesel : :

                                He smiled at his friends excitment.

                                Diesel: Alright lets go get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get to kill some bots doing it!

                                Diesel transformes to his fuel truck mode.

                                Diesel: Roll out!

                                He drives out and pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to lead the way.
